subject: Officiating (Sports)
Assaults
Football
lead_paragraph: A player was sentenced to 10 years in prison for slamming a referee in the face with his helmet at the end of an unruly semiprofessional game in upstate New York.
snippet: A player was sentenced to 10 years in prison for slamming a referee in the face with his helmet at the end of an unruly semiprofessional game in upstate New York.
